sentences.sContent: She still needs to analyse the data.
sentences.sCn: 她仍需要分析这些数据。

sentences.sContent: You need to sit down and analyse why you feel so upset.
sentences.sCn: 你得坐下来想一想自己为什么会那么生气。

sentences.sContent: Joe had never tried to analyze their relationship.
sentences.sCn: 乔从未试图去理清他们的关系。

words.tran: 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
分析的；解析的；善于分析的
[计] 分析器；分析者；检偏镜

remMethod.val: ana(分开) ＋ lyse(放) → 分开放 → 分析； 分解

trans.tranOther: to examine or think about something carefully, in order to understand it
